Title: Sorry If I Want to Marry You
Writer: Chiara Barzini (screenplay), Luca Infascelli (screenplay), Federico Moccia
Actors: Raoul Bova, Michela Quattrociocche, Francesco Apolloni, Luca Angeletti
Plot: The love between Alex, a mature successful advertising agent, and Niki, now twenty, continues to deepen and blossom. It has now been three years since they vowed to love each other forever ...
